trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGME105_04936_SEQ_00<tab>Having seen the district to her satisfaction, Wuk Lamat is ready to head to the meeting point.
TEXT_KINGME105_04936_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Wuk Lamat.
TEXT_KINGME105_04936_TODO_01<tab>Survey the designated location.
TEXT_KINGME105_04936_TODO_02<tab>Speak with the blue-scaled Hoobigo child and follow their lead while accompanied by Wuk Lamat.
TEXT_KINGME105_04936_TODO_03<tab>Follow the blue-scaled Hoobigo child while accompanied by Wuk Lamat.
TEXT_KINGME105_04936_TODO_04<tab>Speak with Wuk Lamat.
TEXT_KINGME105_04936_WUKLAMAT_000_001<tab>So, we're supposed to go to a place called True Vue, in the eastern sector. This conveyor ought to take us there.
TEXT_KINGME105_04936_WUKLAMAT_000_002<tab>You know, once you get used to it, they're actually kind of fun. Come on, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
TEXT_KINGME105_04936_WUKLAMAT_000_010<tab>This is the right place, you think?
TEXT_KINGME105_04936_WUKLAMAT_000_011<tab>I don't see the others, though...
TEXT_KINGME105_04936_WUKLAMAT_000_012<tab>Well, rather than sitting and waiting, we might as well explore a bit more.
TEXT_KINGME105_04936_WUKLAMAT_000_013<tab>Huh? <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, look over there!
TEXT_KINGME105_04936_WUKLAMAT_000_014<tab>A Mamool Ja child... What are they doing here?
TEXT_KINGME105_04936_WUKLAMAT_000_015<tab>You noticed too, right? The resemblance to Zoraal Ja.
TEXT_KINGME105_04936_WUKLAMAT_000_016<tab>The blue scales of a Boonewa with the features of a Hoobigo...
TEXT_KINGME105_04936_WUKLAMAT_000_017<tab>This can't be a coincidence.
TEXT_KINGME105_04936_WUKLAMAT_000_018<tab>At any rate, it wouldn't do to leave such a small child on their own.
TEXT_KINGME105_04936_WUKLAMAT_000_019<tab>Come on, let's go after them!
TEXT_KINGME105_04936_WUKLAMAT_100_019<tab>I think they ran this way...
TEXT_KINGME105_04936_WUKLAMAT_000_020<tab>So this is True Vue. I'm not sure what I'm looking at, but it does seem lively!
TEXT_KINGME105_04936_WUKLAMAT_000_021<tab>That building's just about the only one that isn't lit up. Not open for business at the moment, I guess?
TEXT_KINGME105_04936_WUKLAMAT_000_022<tab>Uwaaah!?
TEXT_KINGME105_04936_WUKLAMAT_000_023<tab>I-I didn't see you there...
TEXT_KINGME105_04936_WUKLAMAT_000_024<tab>Listen, we don't mean you any harm. We just want to talk.
TEXT_KINGME105_04936_WUKLAMAT_000_025<tab>It's a bit odd, don't you think? They run off when we approach, only to suddenly reappear...
TEXT_KINGME105_04936_WUKLAMAT_000_026<tab>Could it be they want to take us somewhere?
TEXT_KINGME105_04936_WUKLAMAT_000_027<tab>Is that the way of it? You want us to follow you?
TEXT_KINGME105_04936_WUKLAMAT_000_028<tab>So it is! Alright, then, lead the way!
TEXT_KINGME105_04936_WUKLAMAT_000_030<tab>Let's see where they take us.
TEXT_KINGME105_04936_GULOOLJA_000_040<tab>...!
TEXT_KINGME105_04936_SYSTEM_000_041<tab>Once you choose to depart, Wuk Lamat will accompany you. The blue-scaled Hoobigo child will then begin moving towards the destination.
TEXT_KINGME105_04936_SYSTEM_000_042<tab>Make your way to the destination without falling behind.
TEXT_KINGME105_04936_SYSTEM_000_043<tab>If you leave Wuk Lamat behind for any reason, or lose sight of the blue-scaled Hoobigo child, you may try again by returning to the starting point.
TEXT_KINGME105_04936_SYSTEM_000_044<tab>Follow the blue-scaled Hoobigo child?
TEXT_KINGME105_04936_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you do?
TEXT_KINGME105_04936_A1_000_001<tab>Talk.
TEXT_KINGME105_04936_A1_000_002<tab>Part ways.
TEXT_KINGME105_04936_A1_000_003<tab>Nothing.
TEXT_KINGME105_04936_WUKLAMAT_100_044<tab>Let's try not to lose sight of them this time!
TEXT_KINGME105_04936_Q2_000_000<tab>Are you sure you wish to part ways with Wuk Lamat?
TEXT_KINGME105_04936_WUKLAMAT_100_045<tab>Hm? Alexandrian food not agreeing with your stomach? Alright, I'll let the little one know you need some time. We'll wait for you back where we started.
TEXT_KINGME105_04936_SYSTEM_110_045<tab>Wuk Lamat has yet to arrive. Be sure she is at your side before attempting to continue.
TEXT_KINGME105_04936_WUKLAMAT_120_045<tab>Damn it, we've lost them! Probably best to return to where we started...
TEXT_KINGME105_04936_SYSTEM_130_045<tab>Speak with the blue-scaled Hoobigo child in the recreation zone to try again.
TEXT_KINGME105_04936_GULOOLJA_000_045<tab>...!
TEXT_KINGME105_04936_SYSTEM_000_046<tab>Once you choose to depart, Wuk Lamat will accompany you. The blue-scaled Hoobigo child will then begin moving towards the destination.
TEXT_KINGME105_04936_WUKLAMAT_000_050<tab>Is this where you wanted to bring us?
TEXT_KINGME105_04936_WUKLAMAT_000_051<tab>What is this place? If you're meant to relax here, it isn't working for me...
TEXT_KINGME105_04936_WUKLAMAT_000_052<tab>Hey, what's your name?
TEXT_KINGME105_04936_WUKLAMAT_000_053<tab>So you're still not inclined to talk...
TEXT_KINGME105_04936_MELANCHOLY_000_054<tab>He'll only talk if he's completely comfortable with you.
TEXT_KINGME105_04936_WUKLAMAT_000_055<tab>You know him?
TEXT_KINGME105_04936_MELANCHOLY_000_056<tab>After a fashion. But never mind that. How about something to wet your whistle?
TEXT_KINGME105_04936_MELANCHOLY_000_057<tab>Adorable as you are, it's on the house. I can recommend our special─Her Majesty. I'll prepare one without liquor for the boy, too.
TEXT_KINGME105_04936_WUKLAMAT_000_058<tab>Uh, thanks, but no thanks. We're supposed to meet a friend named Cahciua.
TEXT_KINGME105_04936_WUKLAMAT_000_059<tab>But we ran into the child on the way, and he led us here.
TEXT_KINGME105_04936_MELANCHOLY_000_060<tab>Ohhh, so you're with Cahciua.
TEXT_KINGME105_04936_MELANCHOLY_000_061<tab>In that case, go and have a chat with big Tassos there. He'll show you to a fun place.
TEXT_KINGME105_04936_WUKLAMAT_000_062<tab>What about him?
TEXT_KINGME105_04936_MELANCHOLY_000_063<tab>I don't think he's in a mood to talk, so he can tend the bar with me.
TEXT_KINGME105_04936_WUKLAMAT_000_064<tab>This has taken a turn for the strange, but you don't think we're walking into a trap, do you?
TEXT_KINGME105_04936_WUKLAMAT_000_065<tab>Damned if this doesn't have suspicious written all over it...
TEXT_KINGME105_04936_MELANCHOLY_000_070<tab>If you feel like that drink after all, just let me know.
TEXT_KINGME105_04936_GULOOLJA_000_075<tab>...
TEXT_KINGME105_04936_TASSOS_000_080<tab>You seem eager to go, but what about your friend there?
TEXT_KINGME105_04936_WUKLAMAT_000_090<tab>What is this “fun place” meant to be? Is Cahciua there?
TEXT_KINGME105_04936_WUKLAMAT_000_091<tab>Well, I suppose there's only one way to find out...
